content.title: Beela accompanying you on your journey
content.call: Are you an immigrant woman or non-binary? Are you in Sweden? Are you looking into opportunities to switch to tech or land a job in tech? Look no more!
content.text: A great opportunity for you to connect with a mentor who can offer you insight, advice, opportunity – and help you navigate the next stage/s of your career.  Through mentorship, networking, and a learning environment, we support **YOU**, women, and non-binary people to kick-start your career in tech in Sweden.

content.title: How it works
content.text: The mentorship meetings and the accompanying program will be held digitally, so you are welcome to apply regardless of where in Sweden you live. The program runs twice a year, both in spring and in autumn, and lasts for 4 months.  The next program start date is 25th February 2022.

content.title: Bee a Mentor
content.call: Are you established in the Swedish labour market?  Become a mentor and contribute to diverse labour market.
content.text: Being a mentor in Pollination means that you provide individual support to a person with a foreign background who doesn’t have a job in Sweden or need guidance in their transition to tech market.  Do you want to make a difference? We are looking for mentors from all levels of companies and organizations who can contribute to our program with their engagement and their experience – a small commitment can make a huge difference to someone else!  Applications for Mentors are currently being accepted!  The next **program start date** for the whole of Sweden is **25th February 2022**.  Since you participate digitally (Covid times), you are welcome to apply regardless of where you live in Sweden. **The program is available in English.**

content.title: Program Structure
content.call: Pollination offers two programs per year – one during the autumn and one during the spring. Each program lasts for 4 months. During this time we provide:

list.subtitle: Mentoring meetings
list.text: 1:1 Mentee and mentor sessions: at least 4 meetings throughout the program

list.subtitle: RH Advice
list.text: 1:1 session for mentees with an RH specialist

list.subtitle: Networking sessions
list.text: Gathering sessions where mentees and mentors meet online for networking and to exchange tips and past experiences

list.subtitle: Knowledge Platform
list.text: e-Learning platform to increase your knowledge and help you land a job

content.title: Stories
content.call: What do previous participants say about our program?

list.subtitle: Mentee
list.text: I am much more confident in my knowledge and I found a job!

list.subtitle: Mentee
list.text: It gave me the confidence to be able to express my thoughts and ideas about programming that helped me be more relaxed during my job interviews.

list.subtitle: Mentee
list.text: I got a lot of great tips and got the chance to talk with a person already working as a UX designer in Sweden.

list.subtitle: Mentee
list.text: Just in general, it was very inspiring and motivating to see another woman successfully working in the male-dominated industry.
